bibl.title: Letter from Frank C. Burnett to Philip Showalter Hench, September 29, 1937

div1.p: Burnett sends Hench a copy of the Roll of Honor. He also forwards the address of Thomas M. England.

div1.head: Letter from Frank C. Burnett to Philip Showalter Hench, September 29, 1937
div1.opener:
WAR DEPARTMENT
THE ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE
WASHINGTON
September 29, 1937.
IN REPLY
REFER TO
Off-434-emj
Respectfully returned to
Dr. P. S. Hench,
Mayo Clinic,
Rochester, Minnesota.
div1.p:
There is inclosed the “Roll of Honor” published in the
1937 issue of the Army Register.

This office does not have a record of the present addresses
of the men who are still living except in the case of Captain
Thomas M. England, Medical Administrative Corps, who is now on
duty at Headquarters, Governors Island, New York.
div1.closer:
Frank C. Burnett-
Brigadier General,
Acting The Adjutant General. By: CCM
1 Incl:
